qas.question: When flying to bangladesh from lesotho do i need to quarantine?

answers.text: required to complete mandatory 14 day quarantine at a government nominated quarantine hotel

paragraphs.context: Passengers who have visited, or transited Botswana, Eswatini, Ghana, Lesotho, Namibia, South Africa and Zimbabwe, within the preceding 14 days of 4 December, are required to complete mandatory 14 day quarantine at a government nominated quarantine hotel upon arrival in Bangladesh, regardless of vaccination status.

qas.question: Who covers the cost of quarantine in bangladesh?

answers.text: people staying in a government approved hotel, government facility or hospital will need to cover the costs of those stays and any necessary COVID-19 tests

paragraphs.context: Passengers that are subject to mandatory quarantine hotel stay should confirm their stay prior to travel. Proof of a quarantine hotel reservation will be required at airport check-in. In all circumstances, people staying in a government approved hotel, government facility or hospital will need to cover the costs of those stays and any necessary COVID-19 tests.

qas.question: Where are masks mandatory in bangladesh?

answers.text: masks must be worn at all times

paragraphs.context: Face masks must be worn at all times when moving in and around Bangladesh. Anyone not complying with these requests risks legal action
